page.title: 06HOME LIFE-STIXWOULD
page.content: The village of{Stixwould}lies about two miles to the north of Woodhall Spa.It's population has dropped by about 25% since 1935 and in 1985 stood at 124. There are not any shops nor are there any scheduled buses apart from the school bus that goes to Tattershall and Horncastle.There is a caravan site near to the village duck pond.Many kinds of duck can be found on the pond. The village church is called St.Peter's and every year on St.Peter's Day gifts are presented.Some of the graves in the churchyard are very old.
